song.title: Closer to You my God
song.lyrics:
[C] Closer to You, my God, I long to dwell in You, my creator and Lord, You made me for yourself and my heart's without rest, until it finds rest in You.
[V1] Who but You can fulfill, the desires of my heart, satisfying search for an all perfect love? Who if not You O Lord, God of goodness and grace You the absoolute love that has been for all time?
[V2] May You show me your love, all the days of my life. Without You by my side, I just stumble and fall. May your Spirit of love, fill my heart with your fire, may I learn how to give love and always forgive.
[V3] At the end of my life may You welcome me Lord, in your heart full of love in the Father's own house. May I see You O Lord, contemplate You with joy, live in heaven with You in your love without end.
